feedback: Strengths: You demonstrated a good ability to cover the task by providing a detailed summary of the movie, including its themes and your personal reflection on it. Your logical flow in explaining the plot and thematic elements of the movie was coherent and easy to follow. Weaknesses: There were some grammatical inaccuracies and hesitations ('um', 'uh') that impacted the overall fluency. Additionally, the use of gender pronouns was inconsistent ('finally he becomes an adult'), which could cause confusion. Improving grammatical control and reducing filler words would enhance your clarity and overall effectiveness in communication.
